name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-summarise-employee-feedback
title: Summarize Employee Feedback Prompt
shortDescription: This AI Builder prompt is designed to summarise employee feedback and provide potential solutions to their issues.
longDescription: This AI Builder prompt is designed to summarise employee feedback and provide potential solutions to their issues.

metadata.value: Analyse this [Employee Feedback] and identify the top three primary areas of concern. Provide a concise summary of each issue and propose potential solutions to address each one.
